sentences.en: Can I leave my bag somewhere? It's very heavy to lug around.
sentences.cn: 我能在什么地方存一下包 吗 ?提着它到处走很重.

sentences.en: Do I have to lug those suitcases all the way to the station?
sentences.cn: 难道非要我把那些手提箱一直拉到车站去 吗 ?

sentences.en: For photoflash, lug type, low loss factor and low leakage current.
sentences.cn: 闪光灯用焊片式产品, 具有低损耗, 低漏电等特点.

sentences.en: I had to lug my bags up to the fourth floor.
sentences.cn: 我只得费劲地把我的几个包拖上五楼。

sentences.en: I had to lug ten books to school.
I know I don't want to lug around that extra weight.
sentences.cn: 我绝不想带着过重的那部分到处跑.

sentences.en: Lug body available with ISO flange dimensions and metric bolt hole threads.
sentences.cn: 凸耳式阀体符合ISO法兰尺寸和公制螺栓孔螺纹.

sentences.en: Lug valves can be specified with threaded or thru hole bolting.
sentences.cn: 凸耳阀门可规定采用螺纹孔螺栓连接或贯穿孔螺栓连接.

sentences.en: Nobody wants to lug around huge suitcases full of clothes.
sentences.cn: 谁都不想拖着个装满衣服的大箱子到处走。

sentences.en: She lug ged the suitcase out into the hallway.
sentences.cn: 她吃力地将提箱拖进门厅.

sentences.en: Small suitcase or hand truck to lug everything around.
sentences.cn: 小手提箱或手推车,用来装运身边的东西.

sentences.en: Somehow I managed to lug the wet clothes to the laundromat.
sentences.cn: 我想方设法才艰难地将湿衣物拖到自助洗衣店.

sentences.en: The lug produces a " pinched " effect contact with the groove side.
sentences.cn: 极耳产生一种 “ 压力 ” 作用与沟槽侧边相接触.

sentences.en: The maximum weight allowance is 60 kilos per traveler, excluding hand lug.
sentences.cn: gage. 每个旅客托运的行李最大重量限额是60公斤, 手提行李除外.

sentences.en: This paper introduces a lug mantle and solution of bottom protuberance.
sentences.cn: 介绍一种代替深拉深的变通两体风罩结构,及底部外鼓的解决办法.

words.tran_cn: 使劲拉（lug的现在分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 手柄，（英）耳朵，突出部，<俚>笨家伙
trans.tran_en: a part of something that sticks out and can be used as a handle or a support
to pull or carry something heavy with difficulty
